00029    // Constructor
00030    MdPairEnergyCoefficients::MdPairEnergyCoefficients(MdSystem& system)
00031     : SystemDiagnostic<MdSystem>(system),
00032     nAtomType_(system.simulation().nAtomType()),
00033     nSpecies_(system.simulation().nSpecies()),
00034     pairListPtr_(&system.pairPotential().pairList()),
00035     pairPotentialPtr_(&system.pairPotential()),
00036     boundaryPtr_(&system.boundary()),
00037     maxMoleculeNeighbors_(0)
00038    {}
00039 
00040    // Destructor
00041    MdPairEnergyCoefficients::~MdPairEnergyCoefficients()
00042    {}

00044    // Clear molecules' neighbor list arrays
00045    void MdPairEnergyCoefficients::clear()
00046    {
00047       int iSpecies1, iMolecule1;
00048 
00049       for (iSpecies1 = 0; iSpecies1 < nSpecies_; ++iSpecies1) {
00050          Species *species1Ptr;
00051 
00052          species1Ptr = &system().simulation().species(iSpecies1);
00053          for (iMolecule1 = 0; iMolecule1 < species1Ptr->capacity();
00054              ++iMolecule1) {
00055              moleculeNeighbors_[iSpecies1][iMolecule1].clear();
00056          }
00057       }
00058    }
00059 
00060    // Read input parameters
00061    void MdPairEnergyCoefficients::readParam(std::istream& in)
00062    {
00063       readInterval(in);
00064       readOutputFileName(in);
00065       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00066 
00067       read<PairSelector>(in, "selector", selector_);
00068       read<int>(in, "maxMoleculeNeighbors", maxMoleculeNeighbors_);
00069 
00070       // Set up arrays for every molecule in every species
00071       int iSpecies;
00072 
00073       moleculeNeighbors_.allocate(nSpecies_);
00074       twoMoleculePairEnergy_.allocate(nSpecies_);
00075 
00076       for (iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies_; ++iSpecies) {
00077          Species *speciesPtr;
00078          int nMolecule;
00079          int iMolecule;
00080 
00081          speciesPtr = &system().simulation().species(iSpecies); 
00082          nMolecule = speciesPtr->capacity();
00083 
00084          moleculeNeighbors_[iSpecies].allocate(nMolecule);
00085          twoMoleculePairEnergy_[iSpecies].allocate(nMolecule);
00086          for (iMolecule = 0; iMolecule < nMolecule; ++iMolecule) {
00087             moleculeNeighbors_[iSpecies][iMolecule].
00088                allocate(maxMoleculeNeighbors_);
00089           }
00090       }
00091 
00092       isInitialized_ = true;
00093    }
00094  
00095    // Evaluate energy and print.
00096    void MdPairEnergyCoefficients::sample(long iStep) 
00097    {
00098       if (isAtInterval(iStep)) {
00099 
00100          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00101 //            if (!system().isPairListCurrent()) {
00102 //               system().buildPairList();
00103 //             }
00104 
00105             // First clear neighbor list
00106             clear();
00107 
00108             // Loop over pairs and construct neighbor list per molecule
00109             PairIterator iter;
00110             Atom *atom0Ptr;
00111             Atom *atom1Ptr;
00112 
00113             for (pairListPtr_->begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00114                iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00115                if (selector_.match(*atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr)) {
00116                   Pair< Atom * > atomPair;
00117                   Molecule *moleculePtr;
00118                   Species *speciesPtr;
00119                   int speciesId, moleculeId;
00120 
00121                   atomPair[0] = atom0Ptr;
00122                   atomPair[1] = atom1Ptr;
00123 
00124                   // Store pair in neighbor list of boths atoms' molecules
00125                   // (do double counting, since pair list counts only unique
00126                   // pairs)
00127                   moleculePtr = & atom0Ptr->molecule();
00128                   speciesPtr =  & moleculePtr->species();
00129                   speciesId = speciesPtr->id();
00130                   moleculeId = moleculePtr->id();
00131 
00132                   moleculeNeighbors_[speciesId][moleculeId].
00133                      append(atomPair);
00134 
00135                   moleculePtr = & atom1Ptr->molecule();
00136                   speciesPtr =  & moleculePtr->species();
00137                   speciesId = speciesPtr->id();
00138                   moleculeId = moleculePtr->id();
00139 
00140                   // store atomPair in reverse order
00141                   atomPair[0] = atom1Ptr;
00142                   atomPair[1] = atom0Ptr;
00143 
00144                   moleculeNeighbors_[speciesId][moleculeId].
00145                      append(atomPair);
00146                } 
00147             } // end pair loop
00148 
00149             // Now loop over all molecules
00150             double moleculePESq = 0.0;
00151             double pairEnergy=0.0;
00152             double twoMoleculePESq=0.0;
00153 
00154             double rsq;
00155             int iSpecies1, iMolecule1;
00156 
00157             for (iSpecies1 = 0; iSpecies1 < nSpecies_; ++iSpecies1) {
00158                Species *species1Ptr;
00159 
00160                species1Ptr = &system().simulation().species(iSpecies1); 
00161                for (iMolecule1 = 0; iMolecule1 < species1Ptr->capacity();
00162                   ++iMolecule1) {
00163                   int iSpecies2, iMolecule2;
00164 
00165                   double moleculePairEnergy=0.0;
00166                   
00167                   // clear array for pair energy with neighboring molecules
00168                   for (iSpecies2 = 0; iSpecies2 < nSpecies_; ++iSpecies2) {
00169                      Species *species2Ptr;
00170 
00171                      species2Ptr = &system().simulation().species(iSpecies2);
00172                      for (iMolecule2 = 0; iMolecule2 < species2Ptr->capacity();
00173                         ++iMolecule2) {
00174                         twoMoleculePairEnergy_[iSpecies2][iMolecule2]=0.0;
00175                      }
00176                   }
00177 
00178                   // Loop over this molecule's neighbors
00179                   DSArray< Pair< Atom *> > *neighborsPtr;
00180                   ConstArrayIterator< Pair< Atom *> > it;
00181 
00182                   neighborsPtr=&moleculeNeighbors_[iSpecies1][iMolecule1];
00183                   for (neighborsPtr->begin(it); it.notEnd(); ++it) {
00184                      Atom *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr;
00185                      atom0Ptr = (*it)[0];
00186                      atom1Ptr = (*it)[1];
00187 
00188                      if (selector_.match(*atom0Ptr,*atom1Ptr)) {
00189                         double energy;
00190                         Species *species2Ptr;
00191                         Molecule *molecule2Ptr;
00192                         int species2Id,molecule2Id;
00193 
00194                         // Load second atom's molecule and species
00195                         molecule2Ptr = &atom1Ptr->molecule();
00196                         species2Ptr = &atom1Ptr->molecule().species();
00197                         species2Id = species2Ptr->id();
00198                         molecule2Id = molecule2Ptr->id();
00199 
00200                         rsq = boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(),
00201                            atom1Ptr->position());
00202                         energy = pairPotentialPtr_->energy(rsq,
00203                            atom0Ptr->typeId(), atom1Ptr->typeId());
00204 
00205                         // increment pair energy of this molecule pair
00206                         twoMoleculePairEnergy_[species2Id][molecule2Id] +=
00207                            energy;
00208                      } 
00209                   } // end neighbors loop
00210 
00211                   // sum the molecular pair energies and their squares
00212                   for (iSpecies2 = 0; iSpecies2 < nSpecies_; ++iSpecies2) {
00213                      Species *species2Ptr;
00214 
00215                      species2Ptr = &system().simulation().species(iSpecies2);
00216                      for (iMolecule2 = 0; iMolecule2 < species2Ptr->capacity();
00217                         ++iMolecule2) {
00218                         double energy = 
00219                            twoMoleculePairEnergy_[iSpecies2][iMolecule2];
00220                         moleculePairEnergy += energy;
00221                         twoMoleculePESq += energy*energy;
00222                      }
00223 
00224                   }
00225 
00226                   // accumulate total molecular pair energy and its square
00227                   pairEnergy += moleculePairEnergy;
00228                   moleculePESq += moleculePairEnergy*moleculePairEnergy;
00229 
00230                } // end molecule loop
00231 
00232             }  // end species loop
00233 
00234             // Sample sum of pair energies
00235             pairEnergyAccumulator_.sample(pairEnergy);
00236 
00237             // Sample sum of squares of molecular pair energy
00238             moleculePESqAccumulator_.sample(moleculePESq);
00239 
00240             // Sample sum of squares of two molecule pair energy
00241             twoMoleculePESqAccumulator_.sample(twoMoleculePESq);
00242 
00243             // Sample square of total pair energy
00244             pESqAccumulator_.sample(pairEnergy*pairEnergy);
00245 
00246             outputFile_ << Dbl(pairEnergy);
00247             outputFile_ << Dbl(moleculePESq);
00248             outputFile_ << Dbl(twoMoleculePESq);
00249             outputFile_ << Dbl(pairEnergy*pairEnergy);
00250 
00251          #endif
00252          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00253       }
00254    }
00255  
00256    /* 
00257    * Summary
00258    */
00259    void MdPairEnergyCoefficients::output() 
00260    {
00261       // Close *.dat file
00262       outputFile_.close();
00263 
00264       // Open and write summary file
00265       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00266       writeParam(outputFile_);
00267       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00268 
00269       outputFile_ << "File format:" << std::endl;
00270       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00271       outputFile_ << "  ";
00272       outputFile_ << "[pairE]        ";
00273       outputFile_ << "[moPairESq]    ";
00274       outputFile_ << "[twoMolPairESq]";
00275       outputFile_ << "[pairESq]      ";
00276       #endif
00277       outputFile_ << std::endl;
00278 
00279       outputFile_.close();
00280 
00281       // Write averages to separate files
00282       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".pairE.ave"),
00283          outputFile_);
00284       pairEnergyAccumulator_.output(outputFile_);
00285       outputFile_.close();
00286 
00287       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".molPairESq.ave"),
00288          outputFile_);
00289       moleculePESqAccumulator_.output(outputFile_);
00290       outputFile_.close();
00291 
00292       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".twoMolPairESq.ave"),
00293          outputFile_);
00294       twoMoleculePESqAccumulator_.output(outputFile_);
00295       outputFile_.close();
00296      
00297       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".pairESq.ave"),
00298          outputFile_);
00299       pESqAccumulator_.output(outputFile_);
00300       outputFile_.close();
00301    }
